## 2 November 2024

We at SARA Institute would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to [*The News Beak*](https://www.youtube.com/c/thenewsbeak) for featuring us in their news coverage. This recognition is a testament to the hard work, dedication, and passion of everyone involved at SARA, from our students and volunteers to our supporters and educators. Being highlighted by a respected outlet like *The News Beak* not only amplifies our mission of empowering marginalized communities in India through data science education but also validates our ongoing efforts to create equitable opportunities.

This feature will undoubtedly help spread awareness about our initiatives, fostering more support and engagement from the community. We are committed to continuing our work with the same enthusiasm and to reaching even more students who can benefit from quality education and mentorship.

Thank you once again, *The News Beak*, for shining a light on our journey. Your support plays a vital role in motivating us to keep moving forward and expanding our impact.

{{< video https://youtu.be/c0ZJQSdoWXI?si=knEdw6BUsRvAzW07 >}}

## 28 May 2024

On behalf of the entire **SARA Institute of Data Science** team, we extend our deepest gratitude to the **Food Technology Department** at **Guru Jambheshwar University, Hisar**, for graciously hosting us for the Data Science Workshop.  

A special thanks to **Dr. Prof. Manish Kumar**, Head of the Department, for your unwavering support, vision, and leadership in fostering innovation and learning. Your team's enthusiasm and collaborative spirit made the event an incredible success!  

We are honored to have had the opportunity to share insights and empower students with data science knowledge. Looking forward to more collaborations and impactful learning experiences in the future!
